In the meantime, I might suggest trying to open the site in an incognito or private window to rule out any browser cache or extension issues. Let me know how that goes.

conversation.message_text: State Line Tack: End the year with a bang! Enjoy up to 30% OFF + 5X REWARDS points today! Don't miss out on our exciting offers! slt.attn.tv/afClVuDmf20Y
State Line Tack: Kick the new year off with savings! Get up to 30% OFF off over $49 & 2X REWARDS points today! slt.attn.tv/aI6P-EuvA8Hj Some exclusions apply.
State Line Tack: Attention VIP Rewards members! Get early access to our Winter CLEARANCE up to 85% OFF! slt.attn.tv/aE9DBZUaK-pM Act fast supplies are limited!
State Line Tack: Ooops! We had an issue but its fixed! Last shot at Winter CLEARANCE with up to 85% OFF top brands! slt.attn.tv/a9wfUBKqcRVi Limited supplies!
State Line Tack: Stay warm with these hot deals! Shop our current promotions with up to 60% OFF top brands & best sellers! slt.attn.tv/aCkM2FVK83WK
State Line Tack: HISTORIC Winter Storm is coming get ready with our top winter gear up to 65% OFF & 5X Rewards points!slt.attn.tv/a0Na206jnID0 Text Stop to Stop

State Line Tack: Hey, this is Sarah. Thanks for checking out our site! https://slt.attn.tv/aRGM68c8X8Rz

Are you looking for anything in particular today?
Im trying to find a budget friendly western saddle but the  horse i have is a draft mix 16hh horse.
Im not sure where to really start because he's wide too

State Line Tack: I appreciate your interest, and thanks for sharing the photo. What do you think about these options? 
- https://slt.attn.tv/aF1x0Ot-FuTq
- https://slt.attn.tv/a9xr0ICDO5jS
- https://slt.attn.tv/aUn2r_1U3qhF
I need a 16 inch seat. Im coming from the english world and used a 17.5"
For my HDR saddle
State Line Tack: For a 16-inch seat, consider the Silver Royal Williston Wade Saddle. It's suitable for wider horses. Check it out here: https://slt.attn.tv/aYkMDRluYux7/
I did the conversion right? 17.5 english saddle would be equal to a 16 or 17 western saddle
State Line Tack: Yes, a 17.5" English saddle generally converts to a 16" or 17" Western saddle. Always try the saddle for the best fit.
Im like 6' tall and just over 200lb so im not sure if a 16 or 17 would be best.
Should I size up to the 17?
State Line Tack: For your height and weight, a 17" Western saddle might offer more comfort and better fit. Consider trying both sizes if possible.
If one doesn't work out can I return it?

State Line Tack: If you are not completely satisfied with an item, State Line Tack's return policy allows you to return it within 30 days from the date received. You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://slt.attn.tv/a1nqbNCCIZod
Thank you. There was like a 19.99 extra charge at checkout for returns

State Line Tack: Thanks for letting me know, and I'm sorry about that. Please know that items may be subject to a 10% handling and restocking fee. In case you'll need to initiate a return, please call us at 1-888-809-0751 to obtain a Return Authorization Number (RA#) and shipping instructions.
Should I pay that 20 dollar fee or no
State Line Tack: Can you please send a screenshot of the extra charge you're seeing at checkout? I'm happy to take a look and check.
